content:
WindowStyle Enum

Definition

Specifies the type of border that a Window has. Used by the stem.Windows.Window.WindowStyle* property.

In this Article

public enum WindowStyle
Inheritance
Object
ValueType
System.Enum
WindowStyle

Fields

None

Only the client area is visible - the title bar and border are not shown. A NavigationWindow with a stem.Windows.Window.WindowStyle* of None will still display the navigation user interface (UI).
SingleBorderWindow

A window with a single border. This is the default value.
ThreeDBorderWindow

A window with a 3-D border.
ToolWindow

A fixed tool window.
